nodes.text: Transformations is a Print-and-Play set for the card and dice game Star Wars: Destiny. It was released on July 13, 2020.
Fantasy Flight Games is proud to announce a set of twelve brand-new, double-sided print-and-play cards for Star Wars™: Destiny—entitled Transformations.
Find these cards at the link below, and find the rules for using them in the brand-new Rules Reference now available on the Star Wars: Destiny minisite!
